Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/114th
ShortDescription: Southbound 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 111th, State, 115th, and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/114th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 111th, State, 115th, and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/114th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
